featured.text: The Amazons are completely dependent on their slaves ____(29)___ their sharp jaws, so well suited for fighting, are useless in taking care of larvae or for digging.
In time the pupae develop into adults and spend their lives working for the Amazons.
When the Amazons reach the nest of their intended victims, a fierce battle may take place.

definition.zh_def: 亞馬遜，指亞馬遜河流域的熱帶雨林及其生態系統，或指亞馬遜公司，一家大型電子商務和雲計算公司。
definition.en_def: Amazon refers to the Amazon rainforest and river system, or it can refer to Amazon.com, a large e-commerce and cloud computing company.
definition.example: She ordered a book from Amazon and it arrived the next day.
